code: import React,{useContext}from'react';import{TodosContext}from'../contexts/TodosContext';export default function Todo(_ref){var todo=_ref.todo;var _useContext=useContext(TodosContext),deleteTodo=_useContext.deleteTodo;var date="".concat(new Date(todo.dueDate).getDate()+1," / ").concat(new Date(todo.dueDate).getMonth()+1,"  / ").concat(new Date(todo.dueDate).getFullYear()," ");return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("tr",null,/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("td",null,todo.title),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("td",null,date),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("td",null,/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("span",{className:"delete",onClick:function onClick(){return deleteTodo(todo._id);}},"Delete"),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("span",null," | "),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("span",{className:"edit",onClick:function onClick(){return deleteTodo(todo._id);}}," Edit")));}

sourcesContent: import React, { useContext } from 'react' import { TodosContext } from '../contexts/TodosContext' export default function Todo({ todo }) { const { deleteTodo } = useContext(TodosContext) const date = `${new Date(todo.dueDate).getDate() + 1} / ${new Date(todo.dueDate).getMonth() + 1} / ${new Date(todo.dueDate).getFullYear()} ` return ( {todo.title} {date} deleteTodo(todo._id)}>Delete | deleteTodo(todo._id)}> Edit ) }
